item.title: PENNSYLVANIA REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST 10-K
item.description: PENNSYLVANIA REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST, which is in the Real Estate Investment Trusts [6798] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 15, 2022 had 59255 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: properties - 520 instances 2021 - 499 instances million - 492 instances 2020 - 473 instances financial - 451 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
